controller

Class PhotoDisplayController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.PhotoDisplayController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Errorable, Logoutable

    public class PhotoDisplayController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Errorable, Logoutable
    The controller for display photos This controller implements Errorable and Logoutable This controller is accessed by the AlbumListController and the PhotoSearchController
    Author:
    Corentin Rejaud, Julia Sutula
